# Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(naniar)
library(skimr)
```


# Reading Data
// not a csv file, uses delim to specify the type 
```{r}
MessyPenguine <- readr::read_delim("../data/Messy_Penguins.csv", delim=";") %>% 
janitor::clean_names(case="snake")
MessyPenguine
```


```{r}
skimr::skim_without_charts("MessyPenguine")
```

# Replacing " " with NA
```{r}
MessyPenguine_woSpace <- MessyPenguine %>% 
  naniar::replace_with_na_all(condition = ~.x %in% (" "))
glimpse(MessyPenguine_woSpace)
```

# Missing Data
```{r}
visdat::vis_dat(MessyPenguine_woSpace)
```

```{r}
visdat::vis_miss(MessyPenguine_woSpace)
```

# Removing NA Rows
```{r}
tidyr::drop_na(MessyPenguine_woSpace)
MessyPenguine_woSpace
```


# Factors
```{r}
MessyPenguine_factor <- MessyPenguine_woSpace %>%
  mutate(
    species = as.factor(species),
    island = as.factor(island),
    sex = as.factor(sex))
dplyr::glimpse(MessyPenguine_factor)
```

```{r}
MessyPenguine_relocated <- MessyPenguine_factor %>% 
  relocate(where(is.factor), .after= species)
glimpse(MessyPenguine_relocated)
```

# Cleaned Table
```{r}
MessyPenguine_relocated  %>%
  head(10) %>%
  tinytable::tt(caption = "Messy Penguine(Clean)")
```
